function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High diversity of human occupants in restrooms","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to the presence of a high number of different occupants","Mitigation":"Implementing regular cleaning and disinfection schedules, promoting proper hand hygiene, and limiting occupancy","Technologies":"Disinfection equipment, hand hygiene stations, occupancy monitoring systems","People":"Occupants of the restrooms, maintenance staff","Owner":"Building management, maintenance staff"},{"Description":"Variation in bacterial communities with human occupancy and room centrality","Impact":"Potential for spread of bacteria from highly-occupied and centrally located spaces to other areas","Mitigation":"Implementing regular cleaning and disinfection, promoting proper ventilation, and reducing occupancy in highly-occupied spaces","Technologies":"Disinfection equipment, ventilation systems, occupancy monitoring systems","People":"Occupants of the building, maintenance staff","Owner":"Building management, maintenance staff"}]}
